Name: Burning Blood
Description: At the end of combat, heal 6 HP.
Flavor Text: Your body's own blood burns with an undying rage.

Name: Cracked Core
Description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Lightning.
Flavor Text: The mysterious life force which powers the Automatons within the Spire. It appears to be cracked.

Name: Pure Water
Description: At the start of each combat, add a Miracle into your hand.
Flavor Text: Filtered through fine sand and free of impurities.

Name: Ring of the Snake
Description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.
Flavor Text: Made from a fossilized snake. Represents great skill as a huntress.

Name: Akabeko
Description: Your first Attack each combat deals 8 additional damage.
Flavor Text: Muuu~

Name: Anchor
Description: Start each combat with 10 Block.
Flavor Text: Holding this miniature trinket, you feel heavier and more stable.

Name: Ancient Tea Set
Description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with [E] [E] .
Flavor Text: The key to a refreshing night's rest.

Name: Art of War
Description: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain an additional [E] next turn.
Flavor Text: This ancient manuscript contains wisdom from a past age.

Name: Bag of Marbles
Description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Flavor Text: A once popular toy in the City. Useful for throwing enemies off balance.

Name: Bag of Preparation
Description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.
Flavor Text: Oversized adventurer's pack. Has many pockets and straps.

Name: Blood Vial
Description: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.
Flavor Text: A vial containing the blood of a pure and elder vampire.

Name: Bronze Scales
Description: Start each combat with 3 Thorns.
Flavor Text: The sharp scales of the Guardian. Rearranges itself to protect its user.

Name: Centennial Puzzle
Description: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards.
Flavor Text: Upon solving the puzzle, you feel a powerful warmth in your chest.

Name: Ceramic Fish
Description: Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain 9 Gold.
Flavor Text: Meticulously painted, these fish were revered to bring great fortune.

Name: Damaru
Description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Mantra.
Flavor Text: The sound of the small drum keeps your mind awake, revealing a path forward.

Name: Data Disk
Description: Start each combat with 1 Focus.
Flavor Text: This disk contains precious data on birds and snakes.

Name: Dream Catcher
Description: Whenever you Rest, you may add a card into your deck.
Flavor Text: The northern tribes would often use dream catchers at night, believing they led to self improvement.

Name: Happy Flower
Description: Every 3 turns, gain [E] .
Flavor Text: This unceasingly joyous plant is a popular novelty item among nobles.

Name: Juzu Bracelet
Description: Normal enemy combats are no longer encountered in ? rooms.
Flavor Text: A ward against the unknown.

Name: Lantern
Description: Start each combat with an additional [E] .
Flavor Text: An eerie lantern which illuminates only for the wielder.

Name: Maw Bank
Description: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 12 Gold. No longer works when you spend any Gold at a shop.
Flavor Text: Surprisingly popular, despite maw attacks being a regular occurrence.
Conditions for Spawning: Below floor 49 and not in a shop

Name: Meal Ticket
Description: Whenever you enter a shop, heal 15 HP.
Flavor Text: Complimentary meatballs with every visit!

Name: Nunchaku
Description: Every time you play 10 Attacks, gain [E] .
Flavor Text: A good training tool. Improves the posture and agility of the wielder.

Name: Oddly Smooth Stone
Description: Start each combat with 1 Dexterity.
Flavor Text: You have never seen something so smooth and pristine. This must be the work of the Ancients.

Name: Omamori
Description: Negate the next 2 Curses you obtain.
Flavor Text: A common charm for staving off vile spirits. This one seems to possess a spark of divine energy.

Name: Orichalcum
Description: If you end your turn without Block, gain 6 Block.
Flavor Text: A green tinted metal of an unknown origin. Seemingly indestructible.

Name: Pen Nib
Description: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage.
Flavor Text: Holding the nib, you can see everyone ever slain by a previous owner of the pen. A violent history.

Name: Potion Belt
Description: Upon pickup, gain 2 Potion slots.
Flavor Text: I can hold more Potions using this belt!

Name: Preserved Insect
Description: Enemies in Elite combats have 25% less HP.
Flavor Text: The insect seems to create a shrinking aura that targets particularly large enemies.

Name: Red Skull
Description: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 3 additional Strength.
Flavor Text: A small skull covered in ornamental paint.

Name: Regal Pillow
Description: Whenever you Rest, heal an additional 15 HP.
Flavor Text: Now you can get a proper night's rest.

Name: Smiling Mask
Description: The Merchant's card removal service now always costs 50 Gold.
Flavor Text: Mask worn by the Merchant. He must have spares...
Conditions for Spawning: Below floor 49 and not in a shop

Name: Snecko Skull
Description: Whenever you apply Poison, apply an additional 1 Poison.
Flavor Text: A snecko skull in pristine condition. Mysteriously clean and smooth, dirt and grime fall off inexplicably.

Name: Strawberry
Description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7.
Flavor Text: Delicious! Haven't seen any of these since the blight. - Ranwid

Name: The Boot
Description: Whenever you would deal 4 or less unblocked attack damage, increase it to 5.
Flavor Text: When wound up, the boot grows larger in size.

Name: Tiny Chest
Description: Every 4th ? room is a Treasure room.
Flavor Text: A fine prototype. - The Architect

Name: Toy Ornithopter
Description: Whenever you use a potion, heal 5 HP.
Flavor Text: This little toy is the perfect companion for the lone adventurer!

Name: Vajra
Description: Start each combat with 1 Strength.
Flavor Text: An ornamental relic given to warriors displaying glory in battle.

Name: War Paint
Description: Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 random Skills.
Flavor Text: In the past, Ironclads would create wards using enchanted war paint before charging into battle.

Name: Whetstone
Description: Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 random Attacks.
Flavor Text: Flesh never beats steel. - Kublai the Great

Name: Blue Candle
Description: Unplayable Curse cards can now be played. Whenever you play a Curse, lose 1 HP and Exhaust it.
Flavor Text: The flame ignites when shrouded in darkness.

Name: Bottled Flame
Description: Upon pickup, choose an Attack. Start each combat with this card in your hand.
Flavor Text: Inside the bottle resides a flame that eternally burns.

Name: Bottled Lightning
Description: Upon pickup, choose a Skill. Start each combat with this card in your hand.
Flavor Text: Peering into the swirling maelstrom, you see a part of yourself staring back.

Name: Bottled Tornado
Description: Upon pickup, choose a Power card. Start each combat with this card in your hand.
Flavor Text: The bottle gently hums and whirs.

Name: Darkstone Periapt
Description: Whenever you obtain a Curse, increase your Max HP by 6.
Flavor Text: The stone draws power from dark energy, converting it into vitality for the wearer.

Name: Duality
Description: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 temporary Dexterity.
Flavor Text: And the sun was extinguished forever, as if curtains fell before it. - Zoroth

Name: Eternal Feather
Description: For every 5 cards in your deck, heal 3 HP whenever you enter a Rest Site.
Flavor Text: This feather appears to be completely indestructible. What bird does this possibly come from?

Name: Frozen Egg
Description: Whenever you add a Power card into your deck, Upgrade it.
Flavor Text: The egg lies inert and frozen, never to hatch.

Name: Gold-Plated Cables
Description: Your rightmost Orb triggers its passive an additional time.
Flavor Text: Interesting! Even automatons are affected by placebo. - Ranwid

Name: Gremlin Horn
Description: Whenever an enemy dies, gain [E] and draw 1 card.
Flavor Text: Gremlin Nobs are capable of growing until the day they die. Remarkable. - Ranwid

Name: Horn Cleat
Description: At the start of your 2nd turn, gain 14 Block.
Flavor Text: Pleasant to hold in the hand. What was it for?

Name: Ink Bottle
Description: Whenever you play 10 cards, draw 1 card.
Flavor Text: Once exhausted, appears to refill itself in a different color.

Name: Kunai
Description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Dexterity.
Flavor Text: A blade favored by assassins for its lethality at range.

Name: Letter Opener
Description: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.
Flavor Text: Unnaturally sharp.

Name: Matryoshka
Description: The next 2 non-Boss chests you open contain 2 Relics.
Flavor Text: A stackable set of painted dolls. The paint depicts an unknown bird with white eyes and blue feathers.

Name: Meat on the Bone
Description: If your HP is at or below 50% at the end of combat, heal 12 HP.
Flavor Text: The meat keeps replenishing, never seeming to fully run out.

Name: Mercury Hourglass
Description: At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
Flavor Text: An enchanted hourglass that endlessly drips.

Name: Molten Egg
Description: Whenever you add an Attack into your deck, Upgrade it.
Flavor Text: The egg of a Phoenix. It glows red hot with a simmering lava.

Name: Mummified Hand
Description: Whenever you play a Power card, a random card in your hand costs 0 that turn.
Flavor Text: Frequently twitches, especially when your pulse is high.

Name: Ninja Scroll
Description: At the start of each combat, add 3 Shivs into your hand.
Flavor Text: Contains the secrets of assassination.

Name: Ornamental Fan
Description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 4 Block.
Flavor Text: The fan seems to extend and harden as blood is spilled.

Name: Pantograph
Description: At the start of Boss combats, heal 25 HP.
Flavor Text: Solid foundations are not accidental. Tools for planning are a must. - The Architect

Name: Paper Krane
Description: Enemies with Weak deal 40% less damage rather than 25%.
Flavor Text: An origami of a creature from a past age.

Name: Paper Phrog
Description: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage rather than 50%.
Flavor Text: The paper continually folds and unfolds itself into the shape of a small creature.

Name: Pear
Description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 10.
Flavor Text: A common fruit before the Spireblight.

Name: Question Card
Description: Future card rewards have 1 additional card to choose from.
Flavor Text: Those with more choices minimize the downside to chaos. - Kublai the Great

Name: Self-Forming Clay
Description: Whenever you lose HP, gain 3 Block next turn.
Flavor Text: Most curious! It appears to form itself loosely on my thoughts! Tele-clay? - Ranwid

Name: Shuriken
Description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.
Flavor Text: Lightweight throwing weapons. Recommend going for the eyes.

Name: Singing Bowl
Description: When adding cards into your deck, you may raise your Max HP by 2 instead.
Flavor Text: This well-used artifact rings out with a beautiful melody when struck.

Name: Strike Dummy
Description: Cards containing "Strike" deal 3 additional damage.
Flavor Text: It's beat up.

Name: Sundial
Description: Every 3 times you shuffle your draw pile, gain [E] [E] .
Flavor Text: Early man's foolish obsession with time caused them to look to the sky for guidance, hoping for something permanent. - Zoroth

Name: Symbiotic Virus
Description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Dark.
Flavor Text: A little bit of bad can do a lot of good...

Name: Teardrop Locket
Description: Start each combat in Calm.
Flavor Text: Its owner blind, its contents unseen.

Name: The Courier
Description: The Merchant restocks cards, relics, and potions. All prices are reduced by 20%.
Flavor Text: The Merchant's personal pet!
Conditions for Spawning: Below floor 49 and not in a shop

Name: Toxic Egg
Description: Whenever you add a Skill into your deck, Upgrade it.
Flavor Text: What a marvelous discovery! This appears to be the inert egg of some magical creature. Who or what created this? - Ranwid

Name: White Beast Statue
Description: Potions always appear in combat rewards.
Flavor Text: A small white statue of a creature you have never seen before.

Name: Bird-Faced Urn
Description: Whenever you play a Power card, heal 2 HP.
Flavor Text: This urn shows the crow god Mazaleth looking mischievous.

Name: Calipers
Description: At the start of your turn, lose 15 Block rather than all of your Block.
Flavor Text: Mechanical precision leads to greatness - The Architect

Name: Captain's Wheel
Description: At the start of your 3rd turn, gain 18 Block.
Flavor Text: Wooden trinket carved with delicate precision. A name is carved into it but the language is foreign.

Name: Champion Belt
Description: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, apply 1 Weak.
Flavor Text: Only the greatest may wear this belt.

Name: Charon's Ashes
Description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
Flavor Text: Charon was said to be the god of rebirth, eternally dying and reviving in a burst of flame.

Name: Cloak Clasp
Description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block for each card in your hand.
Flavor Text: A simple but sturdy design.

Name: Dead Branch
Description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card into your hand.
Flavor Text: The branch of a tree from a forgotten era.

Name: Du-Vu Doll
Description: For each Curse in your deck, start each combat with 1 Strength.
Flavor Text: A doll devised to gain strength from malicious energy.

Name: Emotion Chip
Description: If you lost HP during the previous turn, trigger the passive ability of all Orbs at the start of your turn.

Name: Fossilized Helix
Description: Prevent the first time you would lose HP each combat.
Flavor Text: Seemingly indestructible, you wonder what kind of creature this belonged to.

Name: Gambling Chip
Description: At the start of each combat, discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.
Flavor Text: You can see a small inscription on one side. It reads: "Bear's Lucky Chip!"

Name: Ginger
Description: You can no longer become Weakened.
Flavor Text: A potent tool in many tonics.

Name: Girya
Description: You can now gain Strength at Rest Sites (up to 3 times).
Flavor Text: This Girya is unfathomably heavy. You could train with this to get significantly stronger.

Name: Golden Eye
Description: Whenever you Scry, Scry 2 additional cards.
Flavor Text: See into the minds of those nearby, predicting their future moves.

Name: Ice Cream
Description: Energy is now conserved between turns.
Flavor Text: Delicious!

Name: Incense Burner
Description: Every 6 turns, gain 1 Intangible.
Flavor Text: The smoke imbues its owner with the spirit of the burned.

Name: Lizard Tail
Description: When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once).
Flavor Text: A fake tail to trick enemies during combat.

Name: Magic Flower
Description: Healing is 50% more effective during combat.
Flavor Text: A flower long thought extinct, somehow preserved in perfect condition.

Name: Mango
Description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 14.
Flavor Text: The most coveted forgotten fruit. Impeccably preserved with no signs of Spireblight.

Name: Old Coin
Description: Upon pickup, gain 300 Gold.
Flavor Text: Unique coins are highly valued by merchants for their historical value and rare metallic composition.
Conditions for Spawning: Below floor 49 and not in a shop

Name: Peace Pipe
Description: You can now remove cards from your deck at Rest Sites.
Flavor Text: Clears the mind and cleanses the soul.

Name: Pocketwatch
Description: Whenever you play 3 or less cards during your turn, draw 3 additional cards at the start of your next turn.
Flavor Text: The hands seem stuck on the 3 o'clock position.

Name: Prayer Wheel
Description: Normal enemies drop an additional card reward.
Flavor Text: The wheel continues to spin, never stopping.

Name: Shovel
Description: You can now Dig for relics at Rest Sites.
Flavor Text: The Spire houses all number of relics from past civilizations and powerful adventurers lost to time. Time to go dig them up!

Name: Stone Calendar
Description: At the end of turn 7, deal 52 damage to ALL enemies.
Flavor Text: The passage of time is imperceptible in the Spire.

Name: The Specimen
Description: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any Poison it has to a random enemy.
Flavor Text: Fascinating! I found a mutated creature demonstrating astounding toxic properties. Storing a sample for later examination. - Ranwid

Name: Thread and Needle
Description: Start each combat with 4 Plated Armor.
Flavor Text: Wrapping the magical thread around your body, you feel harder to the touch.

Name: Tingsha
Description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
Flavor Text: The sound this instrument generates seems to be capable of reverberating to painful levels of volume.

Name: Torii
Description: Whenever you would receive 5 or less unblocked attack damage, reduce it to 1.
Flavor Text: Holding the small Torii, you feel a sense of calm and safety drift through your mind.

Name: Tough Bandages
Description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, gain 3 Block.
Flavor Text: Loss gives strength.

Name: Tungsten Rod
Description: Whenever you would lose HP, lose 1 less.
Flavor Text: It's very very heavy.

Name: Turnip
Description: You can no longer become Frail.
Flavor Text: Best with Ginger.

Name: Unceasing Top
Description: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.
Flavor Text: The top continues to spin effortlessly as if you were in a dream.

Name: Wing Boots
Description: You may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to 3 times.
Flavor Text: Stylish.

Name: Astrolabe
Description: Upon pickup, Transform 3 cards, then Upgrade them.
Flavor Text: A tool to glean invaluable knowledge from the stars.

Name: Black Blood
Description: Replaces Burning Blood. At the end of combat, heal 12 HP.
Flavor Text: The rage grows darker.
Conditions for Spawning: You have the relic Burning Blood

Name: Black Star
Description: Elites drop an additional relic when defeated.
Flavor Text: Originally discovered in the town of the serpent, beside a solitary candle.

Name: Busted Crown
Description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Future card rewards have 2 less cards to choose from.
Flavor Text: The Champ's crown... or a pale imitation?

Name: Calling Bell
Description: Upon pickup, obtain a unique Curse and 3 relics.
Flavor Text: This dark iron bell rang 3 times when you found it, but now stays silent.

Name: Coffee Dripper
Description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer Rest at Rest Sites.
Flavor Text: Yes, another cup please. Back to work. Back to work! - The Architect

Name: Cursed Key
Description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you open a non-Boss chest, obtain a Curse.
Flavor Text: You can feel the malicious energy emanating from the key. Power comes at a price.

Name: Ectoplasm
Description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer gain Gold.
Flavor Text: This blob of slime and energy seems to pulse with life.

Name: Empty Cage
Description: Upon pickup, remove 2 cards from your deck.
Flavor Text: How unusual to cage that which you worship. - Ranwid

Name: Frozen Core
Description: Replaces Cracked Core. If you end your turn with any empty Orb slots, Channel 1 Frost.
Flavor Text: The crack in your core has been filled with a pulsating cold energy.
Conditions for Spawning: You have the relic Cracked Core

Name: Fusion Hammer
Description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer Smith at Rest Sites.
Flavor Text: Once wielded, the owner can never let go.

Name: Holy Water
Description: Replaces Pure Water. At the start of each combat, add 3 Miracles into your hand.
Flavor Text: Collected from a time before the Spire.
Conditions for Spawning: You have the relic Pure Water

Name: Hovering Kite
Description: The first time you discard a card each turn, gain [E] .
Flavor Text: The Kite floats around you in battle, propelled by a mysterious force.

Name: Inserter
Description: Every 2 turns, gain 1 Orb slot.
Flavor Text: Push. Pull. Stack. Repeat.

Name: Mark of Pain
Description: Gain [R] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle 2 Wounds into your draw pile.
Flavor Text: This brand was used by the northern tribes to signify warriors who had mastered pain in battle.

Name: Nuclear Battery
Description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Plasma.
Flavor Text: Ooooh...

Name: Pandora's Box
Description: Upon pickup, Transform all Strike and Defend cards.
Flavor Text: You have a bad feeling about opening this.

Name: Philosopher's Stone
Description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. ALL enemies start combat with 1 Strength.
Flavor Text: Raw energy emanates from the stone, empowering all nearby.

Name: Ring of the Serpent
Description: Replaces Ring of the Snake. At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
Flavor Text: Your ring has morphed and changed forms.
Conditions for Spawning: You have the relic Ring of the Snake

Name: Runic Cube
Description: Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 card.
Flavor Text: The runes are indecipherable.

Name: Runic Dome
Description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer see enemy intents.
Flavor Text: The runes are indecipherable.

Name: Runic Pyramid
Description: At the end of your turn, you no longer discard your hand.
Flavor Text: The runes are indecipherable.

Name: Sacred Bark
Description: Double the effectiveness of potions.
Flavor Text: A bark rumored to originate from the World tree.

Name: Slaver's Collar
Description: During Boss and Elite combats, gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Flavor Text: Rusty miserable chains.

Name: Snecko Eye
Description: At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards. Start each combat Confused.
Flavor Text: An eye of a fallen snecko. Much larger than you imagined.

Name: Sozu
Description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer obtain potions.
Flavor Text: You notice that magical liquids seem to lose their properties when near this relic.

Name: Tiny House
Description: Upon pickup, obtain 1 potion. Gain 50 Gold. Raise your Max HP by 5. Obtain 1 card. Upgrade 1 random card.
Flavor Text: A near perfect implementation of miniaturization. My finest work to date, but still not adequate. - The Architect

Name: Velvet Choker
Description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn.
Flavor Text: Immense power, but too limited. - Kublai the Great

Name: Violet Lotus
Description: Whenever you exit Calm, gain an additional [E] .
Flavor Text: The old texts describe that the surface of "mana pools" were littered with these flowers.

Name: Wrist Blade
Description: Attacks that cost 0 deal 4 additional damage.
Flavor Text: Handy for assassinations.

Name: Brimstone
Description: At the start of your turn, gain 2 Strength and ALL enemies gain 1 Strength.
Flavor Text: Emanates an infernal heat.

Name: Cauldron
Description: Upon pickup, brews 5 random potions.
Flavor Text: The Merchant is actually a rather skilled potion brewer. Buy 4 get 1 free.

Name: Chemical X
Description: The effects of your cost X cards are increased by 2.
Flavor Text: WARNING: Do not combine with sugar, spice, and everything nice.

Name: Clockwork Souvenir
Description: Start each combat with 1 Relic.
Flavor Text: So many intricate gears.

Name: Dolly's Mirror
Description: Upon pickup, obtain an additional copy of a card in your deck.
Flavor Text: I look funny in this.

Name: Frozen Eye
Description: When viewing your Draw Pile, the cards are now shown in order.
Flavor Text: Staring into the eye, you see a glimpse of your future.

Name: Hand Drill
Description: Whenever you break an enemy's Block, apply 2 Vulnerable.
Flavor Text: Spirals are dangerous.

Name: Lee's Waffle
Description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7 and heal all of your HP.
Flavor Text: Tastiest treat you will find in all the Spire! Baked today just for you.

Name: Medical Kit
Description: Unplayable Status cards can now be played. Whenever you play a Status card, Exhaust it.
Flavor Text: Has everything you need! Anti-itch, anti-burn, anti-venom, and more!

Name: Melange
Description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, Scry 3.
Flavor Text: Mysterious sands from an unknown origin. Smells of cinnamon.

Name: Membership Card
Description: 50% discount on all products!
Flavor Text: Bonus membership offer for my most valuable customers!

Name: Orange Pellets
Description: Whenever you play a Power, Attack, and Skill in the same turn, remove all of your debuffs.
Flavor Text: Made from various fungi found throughout the Spire, they will stave off any affliction.

Name: Orrery
Description: Upon pickup, choose and add 5 cards to your deck.
Flavor Text: Once you understand the universe... - Zoroth

Name: Prismatic Shard
Description: Combat reward screens now contain Colorless cards and cards from other colors.
Flavor Text: Looking through the shard, you are able to see entirely new perspectives.

Name: Runic Capacitor
Description: Start each combat with 3 additional Orb slots.
Flavor Text: More is better.

Name: Sling of Courage
Description: Start each Elite combat with 2 Strength.
Flavor Text: A handy tool for dealing with particularly tough opponents.

Name: Strange Spoon
Description: Cards which Exhaust when played will instead discard 50% of the time.
Flavor Text: Staring at the spoon, it appears to bend and twist around before your eyes.

Name: The Abacus
Description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, gain 6 Block.
Flavor Text: One...Two...Three...

Name: Toolbox
Description: At the start of each combat, choose 1 of 3 random Colorless cards and add the chosen card into your hand.
Flavor Text: A tool for every job.

Name: Twisted Funnel
Description: At the start of each combat, apply 4 Poison to ALL enemies.
Flavor Text: I wouldn't drink out of it.

Name: Bloody Idol
Description: Whenever you gain Gold, heal 5 HP.
Flavor Text: The idol now weeps a constant stream of blood.

Name: Cultist Headpiece
Description: You feel more talkative.
Flavor Text: Part of the Flock!

Name: Enchiridion
Description: At the start of each combat, add a random Power card into your hand. It costs 0 for that turn.
Flavor Text: The legendary journal of an ancient lich.

Name: Face Of Cleric
Description: At the end of combat, raise your Max HP by 1.
Flavor Text: Everyone loves Cleric.

Name: Golden Idol
Description: Enemies drop 25% more Gold.
Flavor Text: Made of solid gold, you feel richer just holding it.

Name: Gremlin Visage
Description: Start each combat with 1 Weak.
Flavor Text: Time to run.

Name: Mark of the Bloom
Description: You can no longer heal.
Flavor Text: In the Beyond, thoughts and reality are one.

Name: Mutagenic Strength
Description: Start each combat with 3 Strength. At the end of your first turn, lose 3 Strength.
Flavor Text: The results seem fleeting, triggering when the subject is in danger. - Unknown

Name: N'loth's Gift
Description: Triple the chance of finding Rare cards from combat rewards.
Flavor Text: The strange gift from N'loth. Whenever you try and unwrap it, another wrapped box of the same size lies within.

Name: N'loth's Hungry Face
Description: The next non-Boss chest you open is empty.
Flavor Text: You feel hungry.

Name: Necronomicon
Description: The first Attack played each turn that costs 2 or more is played twice. Upon pickup, obtain a special Curse.
Flavor Text: Only a fool would try and harness this evil power. At night your dreams are haunted by images of the book devouring your mind.

Name: Neow's Lament
Description: Enemies in your first 3 combats will have 1 HP.
Flavor Text: The blessing of lamentation bestowed by Neow.

Name: Nilry's Codex
Description: At the end of your turn, you may shuffle 1 of 3 random cards into your draw pile.
Flavor Text: Crafted by the infamous game master himself. Said to expand one's mind.

Name: Odd Mushroom
Description: When Vulnerable, take 25% more attack damage rather than 50%.
Flavor Text: After consuming trichella parastius I felt larger and less... susceptible. - Ranwid

Name: Red Mask
Description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.
Flavor Text: This very stylish looking mask belongs to the leader of the Red Mask Bandits. Technically that makes you the leader now?

Name: Spirit Poop
Description: It's unpleasant.
Flavor Text: The charred remains of your offering to the spirits.

Name: Ssserpent Head
Description: Whenever you enter a ? room, gain 50 Gold.
Flavor Text: The most fulfilling of lives is that in which you can buy anything!

Name: Warped Tongs
Description: At the start of your turn, Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.
Flavor Text: The cursed tongs emit a strong desire to return to where they were stolen from.
